Name: Amaro-etti Biscotti
Ingredients: 5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Cognac, amaretto and amaro, aromatised with vanilla bitters and Islay single malt.
History: Created in March 2016 by yours truly for Disaronno amaretto.
Nutrition: One serving of Amaro-etti Biscotti contains 251 calories
